name: SMASDA
description:
You're lost in the supermarket, and Mum is missing. Find her before the employees drag you to the back and disappear forever!

Artist - Emily Blane
Coder - Jay Thomson
Designer - Keira Brannigan, Hannah Davidson, Neve O'Neill
SFX - James Rodgers

Skybox Series Free by Avionx on the Unity Asset Store
